type.description: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc

typeCode.description: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown

issuedBy.description: Internet of logistics identity code of issuing party.

key.description: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

RoleCode.description: Other party's role code - e.g. Consignor, Exporter, Manufacturer, Carrier, FreightForwarder, Consignee, Importer, Payer, Payee, ShipTo, ShipFrom, BillTo, BillFrom, RemitTo, RemitFrom, Shipper

RoleName.description: Other party's role name - e.g. Consignor, Exporter, Manufacturer, Carrier, FreightForwarder, Consignee, Importer, Payer, Payee, ShipTo, ShipFrom, BillTo, BillFrom, RemitTo, RemitFrom, Shipper
